author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Use the object MuonGeometryConstants in all the downstream codes rather than MuonDDDConstants

#### PR validation:

Use runTheMatrix.py to validate the tests

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-gem36 Use MuonGeometryConstants rather than MuonDDDConstants
